response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and a testament to craftsmanship. I believe its true worth exceeds expectations, and I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $2,000,000.

The product boasts unparalleled features and benefits that I am confident will meet and exceed your expectations. It comes with a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your satisfaction.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this exceptional product with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 2000000}
